page.title: 07THE BROWNIES
page.content: The Brownies is held at St.Anne's Church Hall at 6:00 until 7:30.There is a first pack and they start at 5:00 until 6:00.At Brownies we make things, play games and do badges.I have got 12 badges.When you get enrolled you say a Promise and a Law.You must keep your Promise and then you will get a little silver badge that you wear at the crossing of the yellow pieces on your tie.For your uniform you have a brown dress with a collar and two pockets.You get a belt and a tie which is yellow and a brown pom pom hat.Some belts have purses on .At Brownies you pay 15p for your subs we also have a little Brown Owl then if you have any spare money you can put it in.Some Sundays we go to Church Parade. We have 3 people from pack 1 and 2.We have 1 person to carry the flag and the other 2 to escort it.
